product_name: Ultimate Direction Jurek Grip Water Bottle - 20 fl. oz.
long_description: The Ultimate Direction Jurek Grip Water Bottle with 20 fl. oz. capacity has an adjustable strap designed to be super efficient, lightweight and comfortable as you run. BPA-free bottle has an easy-drink valve. Carry strap is reflective, breathable and adjustable. Reduces the swing load on your arm. Silicone bands grip the bottle so it doesn't slip. Ultimate Direction Jurek Grip Water Bottle with strap and no liquid weighs only 3.25 oz.
short_description: The Ultimate Direction Jurek Grip Water Bottle with 20 fl. oz. capacity has an adjustable strap designed to be super efficient, lightweight and comfortable as you run.
